annotation_sentence: Oh, hi! It was very... um, interesting.
rationale: The word 'It' is used as a reference to the speaker's previous experience or event being discussed.

annotation_sentence: Yes, I go to top. The view... very beautiful. Can see all city!

annotation_sentence: Yes, I take many photos. But... uh, some too cloudy. Hard to see.

annotation_sentence: Ah, yes! I eat... um, xiaolongbao. It’s very... delicious!

annotation_sentence: Yes, they very kind. Make trip more... um, better.

annotation_sentence: Oh, yes! I want to go again. There is still much, um, to see.
